name: Parallel Universe Pizza Delivery
description:
It's a thousand years in the future! The old world is submerged in boiling oceans, so humanity has moved to the sky, and the art of pizza delivery has evolved!

You must deliver pizzas in mere seconds, and if you fail, you must rewind time and try again. 

Some deliveries will be impossible to accomplish alone, but not to worry; just shift into some parallel universes! Your parallel selves from other universes repeat the exact actions you took in that universe, but you can knock them out of sync if you aren't careful.

Rewind time, shift into parallel universes, and work together with your parallel selves to deliver pizzas on time. Good luck!

Controls

Move: WASD

Look: Mouse

Jump: Space

Interact: E

Q: Quick Rewind

R: Reset Level

Game by Logan Pladl @LoganPladl

I'm going to keep working on this game so let me know what you think!
